/**
 * @ngdoc directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiBreadcrumb
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @description
 * Used for display of a trail of links, signifying a path back to the root.  NOTE: If there is only one item in
 * the bound array, breadcrumbs will not be shown
 *
 * @parameters
 * @param {IBreadcrumb []} crumbs Array of breadcrumbs {title, url}.
 *
 * @example
 *    <example module="xui">
 *        <file src="src/components/breadcrumb/docs/breadcrumb-examples.html" name="index.html"></file>
 *        <file src="src/components/breadcrumb/docs/breadcrumb-examples.js" name="app.js"></file>
 *    </example>
 */
 
export class Breadcrumb implements ng.IDirective {
 
    public restrict = "E";
    public templateUrl = "xui/components/breadcrumb/breadcrumb-directive.html";
    public scope = {};
    public controller = "xuiBreadcrumbController";
    public controllerAs = "breadcrumbvm";
    public bindToController = {
        crumbs: "<"
    };
}
